titles.title: Impeaching Kimberly A. Cheatle, Director of the United States Secret Service, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
Impeaching Kimberly A. Cheatle, Director of the United States Secret Service, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches U.S. Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle for high crimes and misdemeanors for neglecting her duty to lead the Secret Service in a manner that provides effective protection to protectees, including former President Donald J. Trump.
